section_name.about: Hi, I'm currently studying Software Development at Code Fellows. Through which I have a basic understanding of programming to execute concepts and ideas. I've always been fascinated with the relationship between technology and creativity. That said, I'm looking forward to expanding the knowledge and skills needed to turn my creative concepts into products people will enjoy.

projects.title: Cookie Stand
projects.description: Cookie stand with random sales of locations are generated on a table  and can add a location to the table

projects.title: Bus Mall
projects.description: Vote on products and display results in a chart

projects.title: Store Front
projects.description: Online store where a merchant can add items to the page and customers can add items to their cart
